data.actual_result: The role glitches back to it's previous position.
data.expected_result: The role should successfully move to the role under you.
data.short_description: Unable to move roles to the role right under yours
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're on a server where you can manage roles (you must **not** be owner) - Attempt to move a role to the one under the role you're in - Click **Save Changes**
